forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Clear, with a low around 44. East wind around 3 mph.

forecast.name: Tuesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 59, with temperatures falling to around 56 in the afternoon. North wind 2 to 6 mph.

weather_report:
In the stillness of the early morning, Downtown San Francisco embraces a clear sky that promises a day of brilliant sunshine, though the crispness of the air carries a hint of chill. The temperature is set to linger in the low fifties as the sun ascends, illuminating the iconic skyline while banishing any lingering shadows of fog that typically dance along the bay. A gentle breeze from the north caresses the city, an invitation for the day’s activities to unfold. The absence of significant fog allows for a panoramic view, accentuating the striking silhouette of the Golden Gate Bridge against a canvas of azure.

As the hours creep toward midday, dressing in layers would be prudent. A light jacket or sweater will offer comfort against the morning’s coolness, giving way to a more laid-back attire as warmth envelopes the city. As afternoon beckons, consider a leisurely stroll along Embarcadero or perhaps a visit to one of the many quaint cafes, where the atmosphere is as inviting as the weather. This day holds the potential for simple pleasures beneath a clear sky, making it ideal for open-air explorations or quiet moments spent watching the world go by, all set to the serenade of life in this vibrant urban enclave.
